tha-ap146:0.3_0: He is surrounded by senior monks, who sometimes and senior monks.
tha-ap146:1.2_0: world’s Elder, unskilled in the world,
tha-ap146:3.3_0: They will build a monument for it,
tha-ap146:4.1_0: When continued existence has become extinguished,
tha-ap146:4.4_0: There is fruit of past deeds.
tha-ap146:5.2_0: Other men, too, were reborn here.
tha-ap146:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap146:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sajjha.
tha-ap146:8.1_0: by speech, the senior mendicants, is fourth part of the senior.
